name: MY DAVID ACADEMIA
description: MyDavidAcademia will lead you down a long path of multiple endings each choice really does make a big difference in the grand scheme of things one simple choice can lead you to building a whole city in Iceland or become British or a rapper or die in a Mcdonalds or live a happy life with your mom this game started out has a joke a year ago from today but now i have spent up to 4 hours a day working on this game all i ask is that you enjoy it and there will be updates to the game in the future and whenever you donate and leave a review ill give you a NTF from the game that you can do whatever you want with it and once this game comes out on steam you will get a steam key for it and also when you donate you get access to the discord and ill make you into David
